channel.title: self drafted on Buckethead Creations
channel.description: Recent content in self drafted on Buckethead Creations

item.title: Garlic - Into the Mists
item.description: References Art by @kenha604. Pattern humanoid pattern and abs tutorial by Nazfx + self drafting Time Two months. Gallery Maker’s Notes Body Patterning I started with a store bought plushie from the spirit TV show, as it had the leg and hip definition I was looking to emulate. I tore it apart and copied the pattern, scanning it into the computer so that I could edit the lines using the path tool in gimp as per my standard workflow.

item.title: Toot - Gamblers Delight
item.description: References Pattern Self drafted, except from the arms which were from Human pattern by Choly Knight and the leg construction technique which was from Raven pattern by NazFX. Materials Part Material body Shannon cuddle canary yellow wings Shannon cuddle canary yellow + gold legs Shannon cuddle rust, garden wire face detailing Shannon cuddle orange, glass eyes + nail polish.

item.title: Ophanim
item.description: References Pattern Doughnut pattern by Choly Knight + self drafting Materials Part Material Amount/Cost body Shannon cuddle red 75x75cm: ~8 fire Shannon cuddle sky blue ?: ~\3 wings Shannon cuddle royal blue and purple 100x75cm: 10 detailing embroidery thread + felt ?: ? All bought from plush addict Time Over a month Gallery Maker’s Notes I wanted to build an angel, something inspired by the Ophanim.
